trans-unit.source: Represents a product that the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.BootstrapperBuilder" /> finds in the <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.BootstrapperBuilder.Path" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.BootstrapperBuilder" /> 可在 <see cref="P:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.BootstrapperBuilder.Path" /> 属性中找到的产品。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see langword="Product" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see langword="Product" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets all products that this product installs.
trans-unit.target: 获取此产品安装的所有产品。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.ProductCollection" /> object that represents all products that this product installs.
trans-unit.target: 表示此产品安装的所有产品的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.ProductCollection" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets a human-readable name for this product.
trans-unit.target: 获取此产品的用户可读名称。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents a human-readable name for this product.
trans-unit.target: 表示此产品用户可读名称的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets a buildable version of the product.
trans-unit.target: 获取产品的可生成版本。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.ProductBuilder" /> object that represents a buildable version of the product.
trans-unit.target: 表示产品的可生成版本的 <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.Bootstrapper.ProductBuilder" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that indicates the unique product identifier of this product.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个字符串，该字符串指示此产品的唯一产品标识符。

trans-unit.source: A string that indicates the unique product identifier of this product.
trans-unit.target: 用于指示此产品的唯一产品标识符的字符串。
